p: The four gene expansion lists were analyzed with TopGO (Fisher’s exact test) to get a general overview of the more represented functional categories ( Supplementary Table S5 ). Despite the high number of unknown or non-annotated genes, this analysis showed that the top 100 genes in the NES 2RA output were functionally related to the input genes: the “Anthocyanins” and “Stilbenoids” expansions were populated by genes related to secondary metabolism and defense, while the “ERFs” and “ABA” expansions were populated by many regulators and genes involved in the lipid biosynthesis and in the hormonal and abiotic stress responses, respectively.
